detail_desc: Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Fitted, turtleneck top in mesh with long sleeves.

Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a roll-edged flounce around the neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets, welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

prod_name: FUNC. SB Gavin water res jkt
detail_desc: Parka in windproof, water-repellent breathable functional fabric. Detachable, lined hood, a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and a wind flap with hook and loop fastenings. Zipped chest pocket, flap front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, long sleeves with elastication and a hook and loop tab at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with long sleeves and a hood with a pompom on top. Ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem.

Set with a blouse and pair of shorts in an airy cotton weave. Sleeveless, flared blouse with buttons down the front and a yoke with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders. Puff shorts with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, pleats at the top and covered elastication around the hems.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with pointed toes. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with notch lapels, a sewn-in wrapover at the top with a concealed press-stud, shoulder pads and long sleeves with concealed press-studs at the cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs with creases. Lined at the top.
Short necklaces in various designs. Two with metal chains and two with wider bands. Adjustable length, 29-38 cm and 33-42 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in two parts with sparkly stones. Size approx. 3.5 cm.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted top in soft, ribbed viscose jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and short sleeves.

Suit trousers in a cotton Oxford weave with an extended waistband with adjustable elastication and a concealed fastening, and zip fly and button. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a flap and button and legs with creases.
Straw hat with a band. Width of brim 8 cm.
Lined, underwired bikini top with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Short dungaree dress in stretch cotton corduroy with straps that fasten with buttons at the front, an open, frill-trimmed chest pocket and buttons at the sides.
Blouse in a textured weave with a square neckline and covered buttons down the front. Short, elasticated sleeves and a flounce at the hem.

Body in microfibre and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, a lined gusset with press-studs and a high cut at the back.
Gently flared vest top in marled jersey made from a cotton blend with deep armholes, a racer back and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

V-neck body in microfibre and lace with non-wired, soft, unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a lace racer back. Lined gusset with press-studs and a half-string back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a rib-knit turtle neck, long raglan sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Flared shirt in woven fabric with a gathered grandad collar, buttons down the front and wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Knee-length dress in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a sheen. V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves, an inset panel at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Fancy dress mask in moulded plastic with sequins and a glittery finish. Satin ribbon ties at the back.

Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered hood, stand up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Padded front and back sections, zipped side pockets, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs and inset side panels in sturdy jersey lined with thermal fleece. Longer and rounded at the back. Partly lined.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a V-neck and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Top in a crêpe weave with a scalloped V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and elastic hem.
Seersucker dress in a narrow cut at the top with a gentle flare to the hem. Elasticated top, narrow shoulder straps and a rounded hem.
Vest top in patterned cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Cropped, soft jersey top in a narrow cut at the top with a racer back and narrow shoulder straps.
Short dress in cotton lace with a slightly deeper neckline at the back, 3/4-length trumpet sleeves and a gently flared skirt. Lined with a short jersey dress with narrow shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Knee-length dress in a slightly stretchy cotton weave with a sheen. Boat neck and 3/4-length sleeves with an opening and ties at the cuffs.
Tunic in an airy linen and viscose weave with a V-neck, box pleat at the front, dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with faceted sparkly stones around the neckline. Narrow cut at the top and an opening with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless top in a viscose weave with a V-neck and spaghetti straps. Partly lined.
Bikini top with lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and support, a deep V-neck and wide shoulder straps with laser-cut edges. Elasticated hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Plasters with print motifs. Supplied in a patterned metal box with a lid. Size of box 3x7x9.5 cm.
Wide, off-the-shoulder top in a patterned viscose weave with a frill trim and elastication around the top and short trumpet sleeves.
Treggings in soft corduroy. Skinny fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Sleeveless top in slub cotton jersey with woven broderie anglaise flounces around the shoulders and at the top.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.

Short, fitted dress in lace with a deep V-neck front and back and narrow ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and scalloped trim around the neckline and hem. Partly lined.
Adjustable braces in herringbone-patterned elastic with metal fasteners.
Short, fitted dress in sturdy jersey with a V-neck and long sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
High-waisted shorts in washed, stretch denim. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, back pockets and sewn-in rolled-up edges at the hems.
Thong briefs in organic cotton jersey with a lined gusset and low waist with visible elastication.
Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves.

prod_name: Sanne bustier LS s.0 fast buy
detail_desc: Fitted, long-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a seam under the bust.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an appliqué and print motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Shaping bikers in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset, longer legs and laser-cut edges. Light shaping effect on the waist, bum and hips.
Off-the-shoulder top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves. Flounce at the top and smocking at the hem.
Hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim approx. 10 cm.

Bralette in fast-drying functional fabric with wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a small embroidery detail at the top, long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Athletic Fit – a fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest with a tapered waist to create a comfortable, modern silhouette.
Boxy polo-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band that has a bow at the back. Width of brim. 5.5 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Cardigan in a soft cable knit with a deep V-neck and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and patch front pockets.
Boxer briefs in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a flounced trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Short top in patterned crêpe jersey with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front, short butterfly sleeves and a cut-out section at the back with a wide tie at the hem.
Ballet pumps in imitation patent leather with a bow at the front and hook and loop tab over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Fancy dress gloves in soft printed fleece with padding at the top and appliqués. Polyester filling.
Soft slippers in imitation suede with elastication around the opening and a loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles,and soft soles in imitation leather with anti-slip protectors.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded shaft, adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sun hat in pattern-weave cotton with a decorative bow on the brim and ties. Lined.
